data.title: Amitabh, Jaya Bachchan celebrate 40 years of marriage
data.meta_description: Here's what your favourite Bollywood celebrities are tweeting.
data.text:
Here's what your favourite Bollywood celebrities are tweeting.

Amitabh and Jaya Bachchan celebrated their 40th wedding anniversary on June 3.

Thanking his fans for the wishes, the 70-year-old actor tweeted: 'To all those that wish us a happy anniversary .. our gratitude and love and blessings .. and joy ! Thank you !'

Meanwhile, he has finished dubbing for Prakash Jha's forthcoming film Satyagraha. 'At last the dub for 'Satyagraha' over and done ... now for the release on Aug 23 .. there is always consolation on job done .. !!' he added.

Abhishek Bachchan too took to the microblogging site to wish his parents: 'June 3rd 1973, 40yrs ago my parents got married. The 2 most important people in my life. Happy anniversary mom and dad, love you.'

The shooting for Milan Luthria's Once Upon A Time In Mumbaai Again got over last weekend in Mumbai. The cast and crew celebrated it by cutting a cake.

Cinematographer Ayananka Bose shared a picture of the cake from the sets and wrote: 'And so it happened...The last day of #outima.. An emotional journey, a Fantastic shoot, New friends. A chapter ends!!'

A sequel of 2010 film Once Upon A Time in Mumbaai, the film stars Akshay Kumar, Imran Khan and Sonakshi Sinha in lead roles and releases on August 8.
